Text: I am soooo glad that you are back SteelerJ17, and I promise to seed everything as much as possible.  Sorry for all the lame people out there, and cheers to you sir!!!

@luckie7 It's good to be back. I was burned out because I would put up good stuff and people were not seeding. If you like Criterion stuff. I have some good ones coming in. Most of them are out of print.
Awesome thank you so very much! I have over half of the collection and am always looking for the other half, lol.  I really appreciate all of the hard work you do for all of us.
